summary: A subliminal OG. An extremely abbstract poem that may have gone too beserk...
poemContent: A visaged wasteland, hanging bodies, drops guts. The raiskaus metsään, in a kingdom of sus. The first dutchess, sussy grass, ozymandias, invisioned, struck killed, euthanasia, fast. Caesura. Azure urea, fecal matter in a focal view. Excrement litters North Korea. Griffith did nothing wrong, what about you? 
